headerText: The `v-time-picker` is stand-alone component that can be utilized in many existing Vuetify components. It offers the user a visual representation for selecting the time.

usage.desc: Time pickers have the light theme enabled by default.

timeColorable.desc: Time picker colors can be set using the `color` and `header-color` props. If `header-color` prop is not provided  header will use the `color` prop value.

timeDialogAndMenu.header: ### Time pickers - In dialog and menu
timeDialogAndMenu.desc: Due to the flexibility of pickers, you can really dial in the experience exactly how you want it.

time24hFormat.desc: A time picker can be switched to 24hr format. Note that the `format` prop defines only the way the picker is displayed, picker's value (model) is always in 24hr format.

timeAllowedTimes.desc: You can specify allowed times using arrays, objects, and functions. You can also specify time step/precision/interval - e.g. 10 minutes.

timeWidth.desc: You can specify allowed the picker's width or make it full width.

v-time-picker.format: Defines the format of a time displayed in picker. Available options are `ampm` and `24hr`.
v-time-picker.allowedHours: Restricts which hours can be selected
v-time-picker.allowedMinutes: Restricts which minutes can be selected
v-time-picker.scrollable: Allows changing hour/minute with mouse scroll
